item.title: Issue #86 created
item.description:
[fo3.1] Fallback for named timezones

ยง9.8.4.6 says "If no timezone name can be identified, the timezone offset is output using the fallback format +01:01." But "+01:01" is not a valid format. It should say either "01:01" or (preferably, I think) "00:00t".
